# Candy Machine v2

:::info This page refers to a previous iteration of Candy Machine known as Candy Machine v2. If youâ€™re looking to create a new Candy Machine, we recommend you use [Candy Machine v3](/programs/candy-machine) instead. ::

The Metaplex Protocolâ€™s Candy Machine is the leading minting and distribution program for fair NFT collection launches on Solana. It allows creators to bring their asset metadata on-chain, configure mints with anti-botting protection, and exchange SOL for randomized NFTs like a traditional candy machine.
